stanza.line: But wherefore do not you a mightier wayway
Make war upon this bloody tyrant TimeTime
And fortify your self in your decaydecay
With means more blessed than my barren rhymerhyme
Now stand you on the top of happy hourshours
And many maiden gardens yet unsetunset
With virtuous wish would bear you living flowersflowers
Much liker than your painted counterfeitcounterfeit
So should the lines of life that life repairrepair
Which this (Time pencil) or my pupil penpen
Neither in inward worth nor outward fairfair
Can make you live your self in eyes of menmen
To give away your self keeps your self stillstill
And you must live drawn by your own sweet skillskill
